member.name: D2D1_CAP_STYLE
member.summary: Describes the shape at the end of a line or segment.

member.name: D2D1_CAP_STYLE.D2D1_CAP_STYLE_FLAT
member.summary: A cap that does not extend past the last point of the line. Comparable to cap used for objects other than lines.

member.name: D2D1_CAP_STYLE.D2D1_CAP_STYLE_SQUARE
member.summary: Half of a square that has a length equal to the line thickness.

member.name: D2D1_CAP_STYLE.D2D1_CAP_STYLE_ROUND
member.summary: A semicircle that has a diameter equal to the line thickness.

member.name: D2D1_CAP_STYLE.D2D1_CAP_STYLE_TRIANGLE
member.summary: An isosceles right triangle whose hypotenuse is equal in length to the thickness of the line.
